name: OVERDRIVE (itch) (crucial)
description:
OVERDRIVE is a challenging platformer with a twist. 

Springy, your walking robot companion, is breaking down so you cannot control when he jumps. Collect nuts and complete levels to repair him.

OVERDRIVE was developed by a team of two friends, and is their first attempt at a Game Jam. Game art and background music were designed specifically for this project.

Controls - 

AD or Arrow Keys for movement.

Creators - 

Nirvogrande 

Crucial
